definition: Hulan district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
Hulan district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang

sentences.english: The white waves ripple in the Hulan River.
The old Hulan River flows gently on an autumn morning.
sentences.chinese: 秋日的清晨，古老的呼蘭河水流過原野。

sentences.english: Hulan is the earliest open region of Qin Dynasty in the northeast China.
sentences.chinese: 呼蘭是清政府在東北最早開禁的地區。
